name: Jig-A-Pix Wonderful World
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Take a Photo, Make a Puzzle!

The World is a wonderful place! In JIGAPIX WONDERFUL WORLD discover spectacular landmarks, locations and imagery from around the world! 80 Amazing images from North and South America, Europe, the Polar Region, Africa, the Middle East and more!

To make things really interesting on Nintendo DSi, JIGAPIX lets you take a photo and turn it into your very own puzzle!

There's something for everyone in JIGAPIX!
